it.polimi.travlendarplus.beans.calendarManager.googleMapsUtilities

Class GMapsJSONReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.travlendarplus.beans.calendarManager.googleMapsUtilities.GMapsJSONReader

  • public class GMapsJSONReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class that is to be used to read the Google Maps direction responses

      • getTransitDetails

        private static org.json.JSONObject getTransitDetails(org.json.JSONObject singleStep)
                                              throws org.json.JSONException
        This method is to be called in case of TRANSIT call to obtain detailed info about the travel means to be taken.
        Parameters:
        singleStep - the travel to be analyzed
        Returns:
        a Json object containing the requested details
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - when no "transit_details" are given ( this happen when there is a WALKING step )

      • getSingleArrivalStop

        private static Location getSingleArrivalStop(org.json.JSONObject singleStep)
                                      throws GMapsUnavailableException,
                                             BadRequestException,
                                             LocationNotFoundException
        Provide the ending location of a travel step
        Parameters:
        singleStep - the travel to be analyzed
        Returns:
        a Json object containing the requested details
        Throws:
        LocationNotFoundException - if google APIs signals that an inserted location is invalid
        GMapsUnavailableException - if google APIs services are not available
        BadRequestException - if the request sent contains syntactical errors

      • getProperTravelMeanEnum

        private static TravelMeanEnum getProperTravelMeanEnum(java.lang.String vehicleType)
        Given a String that represent a vehicle it returns his relative category
        Parameters:
        vehicleType - string that describe the vehicle to be converted
        Returns:
        the relative travelMean enum type

      • checkErrorInStatusCode

        protected static void checkErrorInStatusCode(org.json.JSONObject response)
                                      throws LocationNotFoundException,
                                             GMapsUnavailableException,
                                             BadRequestException
        Checks a google response message; this method is to be invoked when the response status code, returned by google APIs, have to be checked, an relative exception is thrown if in the status code is signaled that something goes wrong during the HTTP call
        Parameters:
        response - JSONObject containing the response returned by google APIs
        Throws:
        LocationNotFoundException - if google APIs signals that an inserted location is invalid
        GMapsUnavailableException - if google APIs services are not available
        BadRequestException - if the request sent contains syntactical errors

      • getTravelNoTransitMeans

        public java.util.ArrayList<Travel> getTravelNoTransitMeans(org.json.JSONObject response,
                                                           TravelMeanEnum type,
                                                           long travelTime,
                                                           boolean departure,
                                                           Location depLoc,
                                                           Location arrLoc)
                                                    throws GMapsUnavailableException,
                                                           BadRequestException,
                                                           LocationNotFoundException
        It creates a Travel with only one TravelComponent, related to NO_TRANSIT and NO_SHARING TravelMean of the specified type.
        Parameters:
        response - Json returned by Google Maps APIs as response
        type - category of the travel mean that is connected to a travel
        travelTime - travel duration
        departure - is used to specify if travelTime refers to departure: if FALSE it refers to arrival.
        depLoc - location at which the travel starts
        arrLoc - location at which the travel ends
        Returns:
        a list of feasible travels
        Throws:
        LocationNotFoundException - if google APIs signals that an inserted location is invalid
        GMapsUnavailableException - if google APIs services are not available
        BadRequestException - if the request sent contains syntactical errors

      • getTravelWithTransitMeans

        public java.util.ArrayList<Travel> getTravelWithTransitMeans(org.json.JSONObject response)
                                                      throws GMapsUnavailableException,
                                                             BadRequestException,
                                                             LocationNotFoundException
        It creates a Travel composed by one or more components, related to TRANSIT TravelMeans
        Parameters:
        response - Json returned by Google Maps APIs as response
        Returns:
        a list of feasible travels
        Throws:
        LocationNotFoundException - if google APIs signals that an inserted location is invalid
        GMapsUnavailableException - if google APIs services are not available
        BadRequestException - if the request sent contains syntactical errors
